message.body: another reason I hate cabs.... one just hit my bus!
u just can't make this stuff up. stupid cabs! on a happier note...we need to plan dinner/drinks/something soon!
Yes, most definitely. Next week sometime?
sounds perfect! let me know what day works best for u. I'm really flexible.
How would Wednesday be? Someplace in the neighborhood?
Wed would be perfect. Doma? or are u in the mood for something else?
Doma is pretty much always good for me ;-) But is there anything new you want to try?
honestly... I love Doma so much and I don't get there often so this would be perfect. what time were u thinking?
Okay. I'll call for a reservation closer to the day.
